alert.note: Alert for Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 23 at 3:18AM EST until December 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level is expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in New Castle County, Delaware and in Salem County, New Jersey. * WHEN...From 7:00 AM until 1:00 PM today. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs along tidal waterways. Some roads become impassable. Minor damage to vulnerable structures may begin to occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Reedy Point MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.4 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 23/10 AM 8.8 3.0 2.8 Moderate 23/11 PM 3.9 -1.9 -1.0 None 24/11 AM 5.2 -0.6 -1.0 None 25/12 AM 3.9 -1.9 -1.0 None 25/12 PM 5.2 -0.6 -0.9 None 26/01 AM 4.5 -1.3 -0.4 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
